content.plan: Today I'm developing a new data-driven art series visualizing global coral reef health data, transforming satellite and temperature measurements into flowing digital patterns that reveal the urgent story of our changing oceans. I'm particularly focused on ensuring the rendering process uses minimal computing power through efficient algorithms, and I've already arranged to offset our digital footprint 2x through direct air capture investments. The final pieces will be part of a larger initiative where 60% of proceeds go directly to marine conservation projects in the Great Barrier Reef.

content.response: Today I'm developing a new data-driven art series visualizing global coral reef health data, transforming satellite and temperature measurements into flowing digital patterns that reveal the urgent story of our changing oceans. I'm particularly focused on ensuring the rendering process uses minimal computing power through efficient algorithms, and I've already arranged to offset our digital footprint 2x through direct air capture investments. The final pieces will be part of a larger initiative where 60% of proceeds go directly to marine conservation projects in the Great Barrier Reef.
